tweet:
"Socialism is seductive because it pretends to create nothing but winners. The reality of socialism is something different." 

Had a lot of fun writing this oped with my friend Rick Larsen, President of @SutherlandInst. Check it out below! https://www.sltrib.com/opinion/commentary/2019/07/31/chris-stewart-rick-b/ …
My sincere condolences to the friends and family of former First Lady of Utah, Norma Matheson. She was a strong leader who devoted her life to the betterment of our state.
Thank you to Dan Coats for his service as the Director of National Intelligence. He has been a great leader and friend. I wish him all the best.

Introduced the Smoke-Free Schools Act with @RepEliotEngel @HaleyLive. E-cigarettes have made their way into schools across the country & have quickly become an epidemic among youth. E-cigarettes need to be taken as serious as combustible cigarettes & this bill is a great start.

The two-year budget agreement:

✅ provides strong funding for our men & women in uniform 

✅ excludes Democrat poison-pill riders 

✅ ensures taxpayer funds don’t pay for abortions  

❌ Democrat’s prohibition on border wall funds

I’m biased, but I think our office always has the best interns. This summer’s interns were no exception. I’ve been impressed by their hard work and look forward to seeing their future accomplishments! #NationalInternDay pic.twitter.com/OIC7TvdnR3

The house just passed #HR3375, which I happily co-sponsored. This bill will implement a nationwide caller authentication system, free to consumers, to help crack down on those badgering robocalls. A great end to a busy day! Thank you @FrankPallone and @repgregwalden!
HAPPENING NOW: Joining @TuckerCarlson on @FoxNews to discuss today’s Mueller hearing. Don’t miss it!

Every leak that occurred from the Special Counsel's office was designed to weaken or embarrass @realDonaldTrump. Every. Single. One. Never was it leaked that there was no evidence of collusion or that the Steele Dossier was funded by Hillary's campaign. pic.twitter.com/P7iaYgIcdZ
HAPPENING NOW: Mueller continues testifying on Capitol Hill, this time before the House Intelligence Committee. Looking forward to asking him many questions. pic.twitter.com/cc7SviJLVI
Happy Pioneer Day, Utah! Celebrating our great state’s heritage from Washington, D.C. Wishing you all a fun and safe holiday! pic.twitter.com/y2vT2CVFs2

The irony of this bill? It hurts the very people it’s claiming to help. While some may have a higher wage, employers will not be able to afford to hire as many people—costing millions their jobs & putting financial strain on families across America. I’m proud to have voted no. https://twitter.com/saltlakechamber/status/1152256816409169920 …

In a rare instance of bipartisanship, the House just voted 332-95 to stop an attempt to impeach the President of the United States. Enough with the political ploys, let’s move forward.

Listen as we take a deep dive into our work on the House Budget Committee. https://stewart.house.gov/stewart-policy-podcast …

As an original cosponsor of H.R. 1044, I am pleased to announce that it passed the House today. This legislation increases the number of family-based immigrant visas of highly-skilled workers. This is a great step in fixing our immigration system.

My deepest sympathies to the Lueck family during this unimaginable time, especially as these horrific details are revealed. I am proud of @slcpd and other law enforcement for their hard work on this case. https://twitter.com/KUTV2News/status/1149003652960407552 …
Joined @_WCYC_ for a round table discussion regarding youth tobacco use. I am amazed by these passionate kids and their work as advocates for the dangers of youth drug use. pic.twitter.com/exyPAl1EJk

Happy #IndependenceDay from my family to yours. As we celebrate with our loved ones, let us remember what this day truly is about. May we honor those who fought for our freedom and those who continue to defend it.

Deeply saddened to learn of the death of Sgt. First Class Elliott J. Robbins from Utah who died serving our country in Afghanistan. My heart aches for his family, especially his wife & baby boy. May his son grow up knowing his father is a hero who served our country valiantly.
